title: Kylie Jenner is body-shamed for a throwback picture with Stormi
text:
Kylie Jenner's attempt at sharing a sweet throwback picture with her daughter has potentially backfired after the makeup mogul experienced a slew of body-shaming comments from online trolls.

The 22-year-old was feeling sentimental Wednesday and decided to post a series of pictures with Stormi, one, from one year ago with both of them wearing swimsuits while lounging outdoors.

But this sparked a number of commenters to express their disbelief with Kylie's figure, specifically the 'abnormal' proportions of her lower half.

Nostalgic: Kylie Jenner was looking back on her early days as a mom while sharing some alluring throwbacks online Wednesday with her daughter, Stormi

Mom goals: The pictures showed Kylie and Stormi, one, in swimsuits on pool chairs. But commenters were more focused on Kylie's 'abnormal' figure in the bikini

Confused: Comments on the post accused the reality star of getting unnatural enhancements and using Photoshop

Kylie was pictured lounging on a pool chair in a neon yellow bikini with her daughter Stormi wrapped in her arms.

'About a year ago with my baby,' she wrote in her caption. 'Where does the time go..'

The reality star, whose natural hair is a dark brunette shade, was modelling platinum blonde locks in the throwback pictures, all while showing off her figure.

'No real human should be shaped that way,' one commenter wrote about the bikini pictures.

Other commenters were in agreement that Kylie's body was perplexing, with some mentioning how they thought the mom-of-one had a plastic surgeon on hand to make the enhancements.

'Y'all really stingy with the surgeons info,' a commenter joked.

Another person wrote: 'With all due respect, your hips just looks unnatural. It just doesn't match your body frame. Just saying.'

Bright spot! Recently, Kylie has shared multiple posts and videos of her daughter following the news of her break up with rapper Travis Scott, 28

Need to know: Other comments implored Kylie to share information about her 'surgeons'

Bad look: The biggest concern people had with the image was how 'abnormal' her figure looked in the pictures

Other people said the figure looked 'abnormal' and couldn't be 'real' based on the proportions shown in the image.

'Body proportions look absurd but let's just continued not talking about it,' a frustrated fan wrote.

Kylie has shared multiple heartwarming pictures and videos with her daughter in the last couple of days following the news of her split from rapper Travis Scott, 28, who is the child's father.

The couple has claimed they just 'fell out of love' with each other upon the news of the break up and said they were planning on focusing on their daughter above everything else.

But there was also a number of cheating rumors surrounding the rapper following the news.

Travis broke his normal code with social media by addressing the cheating rumors head-on in his Instagram Stories.

'It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true. Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real,' he wrote in a statement.

Kylie also faced her own controversy after she was pictured out late one night at the same recording studio where ex-boyfriend Tyga was at the time.

She also took to social media to slam any rumors.

'The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is,' she wrote on Twitter. 'There was no "2am date with Tyga". You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.'
description: Kylie, 22, shared multiple throwback pictures on Wednesday with her daughter. The pictures showed Kylie and Stormi, one, in swimsuits on pool chairs
